name: Keep Swimming: Little Fish in a Big School
name_original: Keep Swimming: Little Fish in a Big School
description: A role-playing game from the perspective of a fish living in Atlantis, a city where fish live lives parallel to humans. The goal is to successfully guide the fish through its first day of high school, making friends, avoiding trouble, and trying to retain as much dignity as possible—things that are notoriously difficult to do as an awkward teen.
